review: Amazon Fire TV was the last gift I purchased for my wife for Christmas, and it arrived in 2 days as promised! it was easy to set up and we were watching Prime and Netflix movies in a matter of minutes. You will find this a great additional to your home entertainment, and Amazon Fire TV is awesome!
author: Justin McCarthy

review: Love Fire TV!  Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it.  Very easy to install and with Amazon Prime you can watch movies and TV shows on demand - no commercials.  We have already watched complete seasons of Justified and The Closer.  Lots of kids cartoons and movies for everyone.  Highly recommend!
author: jan A

review: Amazon Fire TV so far has met my expectations..
author: Donald L Kreuziger

review: Plugged it in, set it up and started watching. Easy to use controller and wide selection of Prime video. Crisp, clear picture on HDTV.
author: Charles G.

review: I purchased this for the MLB package which will not be available for several months. The Fire TV allows be to access Amazon content for the time being. I was able to access this through my TV previously but Fire TV made it MUCH easier. The voice command system works without fault and the set up was quick and easy- what I have come to expect from my dealings with Amazon.
